select * from produce_record where deleted_time is null
and product_name like concat('%',#{productName},'%')
order by produce_record.created_time desc

select product_name, sum(left_quantity) as left_quantity , unit, sum((total_cost / produce_quantity)*left_quantity) as total_cost from produce_record pr where pr.deleted_time is null
and pr.product_name like concat('%',#{productName},'%')
group by product_name,unit
